Package suga.engine.threads

Interface SugaThread

All Superinterfaces:
Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameLogicThread, GraphicsThread
public interface SugaThread extends Runnable
A thread in the SugaEngine is no different from a normal thread except that it has built in pause and stop values. These can be set by calling the appropriate methods.
